All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
Represents the game board of a game of Snake
FoodPellet
Represents a Food Pellet to be eaten by a player in a game of Snake
GameOverHandler
A Scene that shows the Game Over state of a game of Snake
MainMenu
 
ScoreManager
Keeps track of the player's score in a game of Snake
Settings
 
Snake
Represents the Snake player in a game of Snake
Snake.Direction
An enum that represents one of the four directions: Up, Down, Left, or Right
SnakeGame
Represents the game logic of a game of Snake
SnakeGUI
A JavaFX GUI that represents a game of Snake
Tile
Represents a tile on the board of a game of Snake
